title: Frequency Counter
code:
§begin most_frequent
  data ← [3, 1, 3, 3, 2, 1]
  frequency_map ← §create_map
  §iterate item §in data
    §if §exists frequency_map[item]
      frequency_map[item] ← frequency_map[item] ⊕ 1
    §else
      frequency_map[item] ← 1
    §end_if
  §end_iterate
  max_count ← 0
  most_common ← §null
  §iterate key §in frequency_map
    §if frequency_map[key] ⊗ max_count
      max_count ← frequency_map[key]
      most_common ← key
    §end_if
  §end_iterate
  §transmit most_common
§end
solution_description: finds the most frequently occurring element in an array
hints: First loop builds a frequency map
Second loop finds the key with highest count
This identifies the most common element
